narrative:
Licensee voluntarily surrendered his USDA license at time of this inspection. He is no longer engaged in covered activities 
licensed by the USDA. He is aware that he can not engage in covered activities unless licensed by the USDA. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
